charges.charge_description: 18:510A.F FORGERY, OTHER U. S. &; AIDING AND ABETTING(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the USBOP for a term of 2 months; SR for 3 years; fine of $500; Restitution in the amount of $6,880.80; MSA $50***SUPERVISED RELEASE REVOKED***the defendant violated the conditions of his supervised release im posed on 1/8/96. It is ORDERED that defendant's supervised release is hereby revoked. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the USBOP to be imprisoned for a term of 6 months.
